p: Pharmacological activities: Various neuropharmacological actions such nootropic, antistress, antidepressant, anxyiolytic, anticonvulsant and sedative activities of this plant are well reported [ 233, 234, 235, 236]. Furthermore, it also possesses antiamnesic, antiulcer, anticatatonic, antibacterial, immunomodulatory and cardiovascular activity [ 232].
